Package cz2002

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
cz2002.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Represents a Menu Object, storing a collection of MenuItems.
Author:
Symus

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu()
      Constructs the menu. Reads in the csv file "FoodList.csv", creating AlaCarteItem and SetPackage objects as defined by the first value in each line. Sorts the menu using the order inherent from the FoodType enum.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if there is no data in the file.
      NumberFormatException - if the entries in the CSV file are not as expected (e.g. String parsed to Integer).
      InputMismatchException - if the entries in the CSV file are not as expected (e.g. String parsed to Integer).
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index referenced by SetPackage is not an AlaCarteItem.

  • Method Details

    • getList

      public ArrayList<MenuItem> getList()
      Gets the ArrayList of MenuItem.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of MenuItem Objects

    • getItem

      public MenuItem getItem​(int i)
      Gets MenuItem, located at index, in ArrayList of MenuItem objects.
      Parameters:
      i - Index of target MenuItem
      Returns:
      MenuItem

    • add

      public void add​(MenuItem menuItem)
      Adds a MenuItem object to the menu. Sorts the Menu after adding, and checks if the object is an AlaCarteItem. If it is an AlaCarteItem, diffItemIndex will be updated.
      Parameters:
      menuItem - MenuItem object

    • remove

      public void remove​(int i)
      Removes MenuItem, located at index i, from ArrayList of MenuItem objects
      Parameters:
      i - Index of target MenuItem

    • getDiffItemIndex

      public int getDiffItemIndex()
      Gets the index of the first SetPackage item in the ArrayList of MenuItem objects.
      Returns:
      int index

    • closeMenu

      public void closeMenu()
      Overwrites all existing data in "FoodList.csv" with current Menu. Converts AlaCarteItem and SetPackage to String before storing. SetPackage relies on relative index of AlaCarteItem.
